title: Acid hound
data:
- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Acid_hound\&action=edit)*

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

*"Where is this monster found? [Monster difficulty](/wiki/Monster_difficulty "Monster difficulty"), [experience points](/wiki/Experience_points "Experience points") etc."*

The **acid hound** and **acid hound pup** are monsters that appears in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

| d acid hound pup *(No tile)* |                           |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| **Attacks**                  | bite 2d5, acid breath 2d5 |
|                              |                           |

| d acid hound pup *(No tile)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                    |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | bite 2d5, acid breath 2d5                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | 8                                                                  |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | 12                                                                 |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | 5                                                                  |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | 20                                                                 |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | -5 (chaotic)                                                       |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                                              | 1 (Very rare)                                                      |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | yes                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | 200                                                                |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | 200                                                                |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | Small                                                              |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | acid                                                               |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        | acid                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| An acid hound pup:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* normally appears in small [groups](/wiki/Group "Group"). |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                    |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | [monst.c, line 580](/wiki/Source:Monst.c#line580 "Source:Monst.c") |

| d acid hound [File:Acid hound.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Acid_hound.png "File:Acid hound.png") |                           |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                          | Bite 3d5, acid breath 3d5 |
|                                                                                                                      |                           |

| d acid hound [File:Acid hound.png](/index.php?title=Special:Upload\&wpDestFile=Acid_hound.png "File:Acid hound.png")                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                    |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| **Attacks**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Bite 3d5, acid breath 3d5                                          |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| **Base [level](/wiki/Monster_level "Monster level")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | 13                                                                 |
| **[Speed](/wiki/Speed "Speed")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | 14                                                                 |
| **Base [AC](/wiki/Armor_class "Armor class")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 3                                                                  |
| **[Base MR](/wiki/Magic_resistance_\(monster\) "Magic resistance (monster)")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 20                                                                 |
| **[Alignment](/wiki/Alignment#Monster_alignment "Alignment")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  | 0 (neutral)                                                        |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| **[Frequency](/wiki/Monster_frequency "Monster frequency")** (by [normal means](/wiki/Normal_mechanism "Normal mechanism"))                                                                                                                                                                     | 1 (Very rare)                                                      |
| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Yes                                                                |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| **[Weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             | 600                                                                |
| **[Nutritional value](/wiki/Nutrition "Nutrition")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | 300                                                                |
| **[Size](/wiki/Physical_size "Physical size")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Medium                                                             |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | acid                                                               |

|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| An acid hound:* has no hands.
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                    |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                    |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [monst.c, line 622](/wiki/Source:Monst.c#line622 "Source:Monst.c") |

All [Acid Mages](/wiki/Acid_Mage "Acid Mage") start the game with a tame acid hound pup.

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Acid hound

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

A user has suggested improving this page or section as follows:

"Where is this monster found? Monster difficulty, experience points etc."

The acid hound and acid hound pup are monsters that appears in SlashTHEM.


d acid hound pup (No tile)
Attacks bite 2d5, acid breath 2d5
d acid hound pup (No tile)
Attacks

bite 2d5, acid breath 2d5

Base level 8

Speed 12
Base AC 5
Base MR 20
Alignment -5 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable yes
Weight 200
Nutritional value 200
Size Small
Resistances acid
Resistances conveyed acid

An acid hound pup:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • normally appears in small groups.
Reference monst.c, line 580


d acid hound File:Acid hound.png
Attacks Bite 3d5, acid breath 3d5
d acid hound File:Acid hound.png
Attacks

Bite 3d5, acid breath 3d5

Base level 13

Speed 14
Base AC 3
Base MR 20
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 600
Nutritional value 300
Size Medium
Resistances acid
Resistances conveyed acid

An acid hound:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference monst.c, line 622

All Acid Mages start the game with a tame acid hound pup.
